question: Which company developed ivosidenib?
ideal_answer: Ivosidenib has been developed by Agios Pharmaceuticals.

snippets.text: Hence, enasidenib and ivosidenib, the IDH2 and IDH1 inhibitors developed by Agios Pharmaceuticals, have been approved by the Food and Drug Administration on 1 August 2017 and 20 July 2018 for the treatment of adult relapsed or refractory (R/R) AML with IDH2 and IDH1 mutations, respectively.
